articles.title: US-based LAM Research plans to set up semiconductor lab in Karnataka - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Karnataka Minister for Large and Medium Industries MB Patil held a discussion with the company's management representatives in this regard on Thursday. | Bengaluru News
articles.content:
LAM Research, a global provider of semiconductor equipment and services, has shown interest in setting up a new lab in Karnataka.
Karnataka Cabinet Minister MB Patil. (PTI)(HT_PRINT)
